content.prompt: The experience of enslaved people in the southern British colonies as described in the excerpt was similar to the experience of enslaved people in the northern British colonies because

choices.label: many enslaved people in both regions had rights that were recognized under colonial law
many enslaved people in both regions developed strategies to resist slavery
most enslaved people in both regions performed skilled labor in port cities
most enslaved people in both regions had opportunities to earn their freedom
